title: Entertainment: Manga Cafe (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Manga Cafe subcategory within Entertainment. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Many manga cafes offer free soft drinks so that people can enjoy a long stay there.
cards.romaji: manga kissa no .ku wa, ch.jikan taizai o unagasu tame, fur. dorinku sei o totteimasu.
cards.japanese: 漫画喫茶の多くは、長時間滞在を促すため、フリードリンク制をとっています。
